ygData.subject: RE: Level 43 & Dirge Questions~
ygData.msgSnippet: ... yeah I go down close to that.  It s very close to 1.5 bubs. The thing is as soon as I fill up almost 4ish bubbles I tend to just use it then and then I go
ygData.messageBody:
> how much mana does it use for you? i usually go down to 1.5 bubbs left.

yeah I go down close to that. It's very close to 1.5 bubs.
The thing is as soon as I fill up almost 4ish bubbles I tend to just
use it then and then I go down to 0 mana.

> get back to 3.5 bubbs is more like 30 min if i sit often enough, and i would
> say 45 min to get back to full.

It's definitely longer than an hour for me. I never sit down.
I should take my 'Sit' hotkey and delete it. Because the only time
I sit down is when I camp. It also appears that meditate moves the
bar somewhat faster too, I went away from keyboard for 10 mins while
medding and got a bub and a half back. But who knows ;-)

Harmonic.

ps> with 216 STR last night the 6NB hit for 51, woohoo!
